importSettings.title: Import Editor Settings
importSettings.message: Are you sure you want to import the editor settings from a file?
importSettings.detail: This will replace the current editor settings. A backup will be created.

removeProject.title: Remove Project
removeProject.message: Are you sure you want to remove '{{name}}' from the project list?
removeProject.detail: This will not delete the project files.

removeRelease.title: Remove Godot Version
removeRelease.message: Are you sure you want to remove Godot {{version}}?
removeRelease.detail: This will delete all files for this version.
